title: Mushroom tagliatelle 'carbonara'
ingredients: ['120g dried tagliatelle pasta', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '100g portobello mushroom caps, thinly sliced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons dry white wine', '4 tablespoons single cream', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
